3xs.comment: The smallest size of the font spacing.

xxs.comment: The second smallest size of the font spacing.

xs.comment: The extra small size of the font spacing.

s.comment: The small size of the font spacing.

m.comment: The medium size of the font spacing.

l.comment: The large size of the font spacing.

xl.comment: The extra large size of the font spacing.

xxl.comment: The extra extra large size of the font spacing.

3xl.comment: The second most largest size of the font spacing.

4xl.comment: The largest size of the font spacing.
